    public class BoxComment.Info
extends BoxResource.Info
    Contains information about a BoxComment.

    • Method Detail

      • getIsReplyComment

        public boolean getIsReplyComment()
        Gets whether or not the comment is a reply to another comment.
        Returns:
        true if this comment is a reply to another comment; otherwise false.

      • getMessage

        public String getMessage()
        Gets the comment's message.
        Returns:
        the comment's message.

      • setMessage

        public void setMessage(String message)
        Sets the comment's message. The message can contain @mentions by using the string @[userid:username] anywhere within the message, where userid and username are the ID and username of the person being mentioned.
        Parameters:
        message - the comment's new message.

      • getCreatedBy

        public BoxUser.Info getCreatedBy()
        Gets info about the user who created the comment.
        Returns:
        info about the user who created the comment.

      • getCreatedAt

        public Date getCreatedAt()
        Gets the time the comment was created.
        Returns:
        the time the comment was created.

      • getItem

        public BoxResource.Info getItem()
        Gets info about the item this comment is attached to. If the comment is a reply, then the item will be another BoxComment. Otherwise, the item will be a BoxFile.
        Returns:
        the item this comment is attached to.

      • getModifiedBy

        public BoxUser.Info getModifiedBy()
        Gets info about the user who last modified the comment.
        Returns:
        info about the user who last modified the comment.

      • parseJSONMember

        protected void parseJSONMember(JsonObject.Member member)
        Description copied from class: BoxJSONObject
        Invoked with a JSON member whenever this object is updated or created from a JSON object.

        Subclasses should override this method in order to parse any JSON members it knows about. This method is a no-op by default.

        Parameters:
        member - the JSON member to be parsed.
